nodes.bodyText: Please configure checkstyle and code-style, ctrl+L will automatic to format the code.

Is this mandatory?
I personally don't like controls like AutoFormat
After a lot of time, there will be uncontrollable formatting
And it will add a lot of review burden

It is mandatory, and there is the reason why we need checkstyle.[1]
Actually, checkstyle automatic format will make the code more controllable.
For example in this pr,
There is a lot unnecessary changes about import in this pr, if we use checkstyle auto import, there will not have a lot of changes about import.
[1] https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/ra65d23640728b12a8a1102495202ff066accfe99e80e5c694e093d49%40%3Cdev.dolphinscheduler.apache.org%3E
